code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[friends,setFriends]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{axios.get('/api/auth/me',{headers:{Authorization:localStorage.getItem('token')}}).then(res=>{setFriends(res.data.friends||[]);}).catch(()=>{navigate('/');});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Miki Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:friends.map(friend=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>navigate(`/chat/${friend._id}`),children:friend.name||friend.email},friend._id))})]});};export default Dashboard;
